messages.message:
Here are the next steps for the frontend team around the Cypress CI GitHub action (GA) we discussed:
1. Make the GA merge blocking
2. Determine which tests should be merge-blocking:
    a. Bugs that are not acceptable in prod
    b. Non-flaky tests (test code needs to be improved)
3. Move test over:
    a. Move test file to `/apps/src/aihub/__e2e__/PreMerge`
    b. Update the user to platform/automate/analyze user/admin (`CyUser.PLATFORM_ADMIN`, etc)
    c. Make it non-blocking for now ( `CyTag.NON_BLOCKING` )
    d. Optionally skip data clean up 
I'll share a sample PR when it's ready
